description: We all know how fun card games are but Taylor Aims is going to find out just how exciting it really is to lose a game of cards to his good old friends JonnyT, Jeremy Bilding and Dylan McLovin. The friendly wager was, whoever lost was going to get fucked and Taylors buddies did not waste any time sticking their massive cocks into every hole he has to offer.He definitely knows how to drive stick and all his friends are taking him past the speed limit in this scene. Cum watch him get his beautiful facial from three huge loads. Enjoy!
title: Loser Gets It!
